pages.title: Leaf Butterfly
pages.text: Kallima inachus, the orange oakleaf, Indian oakleaf or dead leaf, is a nymphalid butterfly found in Tropical Asia from India to Japan.$(br2)With wings closed, it closely resembles a dry leaf with dark veins and is a commonly cited example of camouflage.

pages.title: Leaf Butterfly
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:dandelion$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: None Days
